title: Six Breakout Offenses, Hard Knocks Recap (Football 8/7)
description:
Will Brinson recaps the debut of "Hard Knocks" (2:00) then welcomes on Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to break down the latest NFL news, including Antonio Brown's foot injury (7:00), the latest with the Dallas Cowboys contracts (15:00), Tom Brady's situation (22:00), if DeAndre Hopkins is the best receiver in football (28:00) plus more. Then the guys dive into the which teams could be breakout offenses in 2019 (40:30). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
